altername_name: Slam 'n Jam '96 featuring Magic & Kareem: Signature Edition
name: Slam 'n Jam '96: Featuring Magic & Kareem
overview: Get ready to take it to the hole with Magic Johnson and Kareem Abdul Jabbar in Slam 'N Jam '96: featuring Magic & Kareem! Featuring fully rendered 3D arenas, players can execute the ever-famous sky-hook, pull off no-look passes, view instant replays for spectacular plays, and set up all kinds of offensive and defensive strategies. Additionally, Van Earl Wright returns as the play-by-play commentator!
